# Build System Documentation

This directory contains documentation related to the build orchestration system and release process.

## Files

- **[BUILD_ORCHESTRATION_IMPLEMENTATION.md](BUILD_ORCHESTRATION_IMPLEMENTATION.md)** - Detailed documentation of the build orchestration implementation, including dependency management, build monitoring, and artifact collection
- **[BUILD_SYSTEM_CONSISTENCY_ANALYSIS.md](BUILD_SYSTEM_CONSISTENCY_ANALYSIS.md)** - Analysis of consistency between the existing GitHub Actions workflows and the new `bllvm-commons` orchestration system
- **[BLLVM_COMMONS_COMPLETION_PLAN.md](BLLVM_COMMONS_COMPLETION_PLAN.md)** - Roadmap for completing the `bllvm-commons` build orchestration system
- **[RELEASE_INCLUSION.md](RELEASE_INCLUSION.md)** - Documentation explaining how `bllvm-commons` binaries are included in releases

## Quick Links

- [Main README](../../README.md) - Project overview
- [Deployment Guide](../deployment/DEPLOYMENT.md) - Production deployment
